author: eptwts
text:
tiktok/IG hustle & lifestyle content is a fkn poisonous hellhole...

if you watch any of that shit and don't visibly cringe you need to take a long hard look at yourself

9/10 of the reels i see on there are very obviously TOF normie-bait preying on their audiences insecurity

if you're gonna spend your time doomscrolling you may as well watch some funny cat videos or some shit - poisoning your mind with soulless content is not the "inspiration" you think it is
